name: Logto
title: logto.io
shortDescription: Logto simplifies authentication for developers by integrating multi-tenancy, enterprise SSO, and RBAC into SaaS or AI apps. It supports OIDC and OAuth 2.1, catering to a range of frameworks and offering a clean management API. Ideal for developers tired of rebuilding auth systems, Logto provides a scalable, secure solution without the usual complexities.
pros: Supports 20+ frameworks and clean Management API
cons: May require technical knowledge to integrate
Limited customization options for less common use cases
Dependent on third-party services for some features
